encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: Are there any Early Fragments of the So-Called Gospel of Peter? Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Five pieces of textual evidence, identified as either fragments of the Gospel of Peter, or in the case of O. I.F.A.O. sans No. d'Inv. (= van Haelst 741) a witness to Peter's role as a gospel writer, are found unproven: P. Cair. Inv. 10759 (= van Haelst 575); P. Oxy. XLI, 2949 (= van Haelst 592); P. Oxy. LX, 4009; P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 2325 (= van Haelst 589); P. Egerton 2 (= van Haelst 586).
